titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to make crop quality reduction disaster payments to producers of the 1992 crop of corn, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S733-734)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to make crop quality reduction disaster payments to producers of the 1992 corn crop under specified terms and conditions.
